subject: Categories: are they still experimental?
msgSnippet: The subject says it all really. Are categories still considered experimental, and if not, should the package be moved out of org.junit.experimental. If they
messageBody:
The subject says it all really. Are categories still considered
experimental, and if not, should the package be moved out of
org.junit.experimental.

If they are still considered experimental, what would be required to move
them to non-experimental?

I would ask the same question for Theories, but, for me, Theories don't
seem to be as mature.

Matthew Farwell.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
